Articles.Content:
So the new update (0.25) has completely wrecked KSP for me. Interestingly, I have two computers (one desktop, one laptop), both of which have dual boot for both linux and windows, and KSP doesn't seem to work in any of these places.

Here I will focus on my laptop running windows (Vista, 32bit, 4gb ram, steam version of ksp 0.25, no mods whatsoever).

Playing the game is currently impossible because clicking on any of the buildings in the KSC view results in the game crashing.

Here is the error message generated by the game:

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.2f1_9abb1b59b47c]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module mono.dll at 001b:10106e5e.

Error occurred at 2014-10-12_105554.

C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by DCMcIlrath.

93% memory in use.

3582 MB physical memory [231 MB free].

0 MB paging file [2881 MB free].

2048 MB user address space [56 MB free].

Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x00000001 ESI: 0x12ed4fa8 EAX: 0x00000000

EBX: 0x12e516e0 ECX: 0x00000000 EDX: 0x3820e428

EIP: 0x10106e5e EBP: 0x002df4f8 SegCs: 0x0000001b

EFlags: 0x00210246 ESP: 0x002df4f4 SegSs: 0x00000023

Bytes at CS:EIP:

89 14 81 ff 46 04 5e 5d c3 55 8b ec 53 8b 5d 08

Stack:

0x002df4f4: 3820e428 002df510 10106eb7 12ed4fa8 (. 8..-..n...O..

0x002df504: 3820e428 002df558 05090540 002df540 (. 8X.-.@[email protected].

0x002df514: 101073c4 12e516e0 002df558 00000000 .s......X.-.....

0x002df524: 002df558 00000400 00000017 3820e428 X.-.........(. 8

0x002df534: 00000000 00000000 050f4e70 002df620 ........pN.. .-.

... etc

So, is there a way to stop the game seg-faulting?

You are running out of memory (or address space) so your only solution will be to reduce the memory requirements. Try changing the texture resolution down a notch in the settings and see if that helps.

Another alternative is to add the option that forces the game to use opengl instead of directx. This significantly reduces the memory requirements though may perform slightly worse.
I got the same issue with with the buildings but every other update was fine. Is the Patch out yet??

I got the same issue with with the buildings but every other update was fine. Is the Patch out yet??

Yeah, I have had the same issue ... Revert and game crashes when loading back into SPH. I have a high-end system with 16GB of RAM so I don't think it's a memory issue.

Unless you are running Linux 64-bit KSP, you are limited to about 3.5 GB of RAM. KSP 0.25 uses significantly more memory than previous versions, probably as a result of the new Spaceplane Plus parts and destroyed building models.

Padishar's advice is sound (like always): you can try the -force-opengl option or lower texture quality. Once Active Texture Management in stable for 0.25, you could also install that.

Otherwise, follow the instructions in the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide. Can't help without good information.

I also had similar issues, and reducing the texture quality (in the main menu settings) by one notch fixed it. Just as Padishar is suggesting.

Cheers,

~Claw
